AdminsMunicipalities.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select M.* from Municipalities M,Roles R,Users U where U.ID=:user and U.ID=R.UserId and R.MunicipalityId=M.ID  and R.RoleName='MunicipalityAdmin') wmTempTable

AllFeeFormCountByMunicipality.name: AllFeeFormCountByMunicipality
AllFeeFormCountByMunicipality.queryString:
select 
count (*) as count
from Fees where  masterForms.formStatuses.allowPayment=:allowPayment  and paidStatus=:paidStatus and  municipalityId=:municipalityId and formGuid IN 
       (select formGuid from MasterForms where userId=:userId or formGuid IN 
              (select relatedGuid from  SharedWith where sharedWithUser = :userId)
        )

AllFeeformCount.name: AllFeeformCount
AllFeeformCount.queryString:
select 
count (*) as count
from Fees where  masterForms.formStatuses.allowPayment=:allowPayment  and paidStatus=:paidStatus  and formGuid IN 
       (select formGuid from MasterForms where userId=:userId or formGuid IN 
              (select relatedGuid from  SharedWith where sharedWithUser = :userId)
        )

AllFeesOfFormsForCreatedByAndSharedWith.queryString:

masterForms.giscontacts.gisrecords.fullAddress as address,
feeType as feeType,

from Fees where masterForms.formStatuses.allowPayment=:allowPayment and paidStatus=:paidStatus and formGuid IN 
       (select formGuid from MasterForms where userId=:userId or formGuid IN 
              (select relatedGuid from  SharedWith where sharedWithUser = :userId)
        )

CheckIfCompanyUserIsVendorAdmin.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as count from VendorAdmins where UserId=:user and VendorId=:vendor) wmTempTable

CheckingUserWithInVendorUsers.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as exist from VendorUsers where UserId=:user and VendorId=:vendor) wmTempTable

CheckingUserWithMunicipalityInRoles.queryString: select count(*) as exist from Roles where MunicipalityId=:muncipality and UserId=:user and RoleName='MunicipalityEmployee'
CheckingUserWithMunicipalityInRoles.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as exist from Roles where MunicipalityId=:muncipality and UserId=:user and RoleName='MunicipalityEmployee') wmTempTable

CompanyFormsByVendorId.name: CompanyFormsByVendorId
CompanyFormsByVendorId.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN MunicipalityGroups AS MG ON MG.id=FS.processOwners
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where
    Closed=:closed
	AND MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedFormGuid from Vendors2form where vendorId=:vendorId)
ORDER BY DateModified DESC

CounCasesByStatusAndMunicipality.name: CounCasesByStatusAndMunicipality
CounCasesByStatusAndMunicipality.queryString:

CountOfProcessFormsByMuncipality.name: CountOfProcessFormsByMuncipality
CountOfProcessFormsByMuncipality.queryString:

	and MG.id=FS.processOwners
	and MF.MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId
	and MF.closed=:closed

CountOfProcessFormsByMuncipality.countQueryString:

    WHERE FS.id=MF.formStatusId
	and MG.id=FS.processOwners

FeeByFeeTypesToDashboard.name: FeeByFeeTypesToDashboard
FeeByFeeTypesToDashboard.queryString:

where MunicipalityId=:municpality and PaidDate BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by FeeType
FeeByFeeTypesToDashboard.countQueryString:

FeesInCartByUser.name: FeesInCartByUser
FeesInCartByUser.queryString:
select id as id,
       fees.masterForms.formTitle as formTitle,
       fees.masterForms.formGuid as formGuid,
       fees.masterForms.formTypes.formType as formType,
       fees.masterForms.formTypes.municipalities.municipalityName
       as municipalityName,
       fees.masterForms.giscontacts.gisrecords.fullAddress as 
       fullAddress,
       fees.feeType as feeType,
       fees.amount as amount
from MyCart 
where userId=:user and fees.paidStatus='Unpaid'

FetchRolesForUserWithMunicipality.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select * from Roles where UserId=:user and MunicipalityId=:municipality) wmTempTable

FormsByCategory.name: FormsByCategory
FormsByCategory.queryString: select FT.* from FormTypes FT,FormCategoryMapping FM,FormCategories FC where FC.ID=:formCategory and FC.ID=FM.FormCategoryId and FM.FormTypeId=FT.ID and FT.Active=:isActive and FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=0
FormsByCategory.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select FT.* from FormTypes FT,FormCategoryMapping FM,FormCategories FC where FC.ID=:formCategory and FC.ID=FM.FormCategoryId and FM.FormTypeId=FT.ID and FT.Active=:isActive and FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=0) wmTempTable

FormsByCategoryForDashBoard.name: FormsByCategoryForDashBoard
FormsByCategoryForDashBoard.queryString:
select count(MF.FormGUID) as counts,FC.Category
--MF.FormTypeId,MF.FormGUID,FT.ID,FT.FormType,FC.ID,FC.Category
from cx2.MasterForms MF 
inner join cx2.FormTypes FT
on  MF.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join  cx2.FormCategoryMapping FCM
on FCM.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join cx2.FormCategories FC
on FC.ID=FCM.FormCategoryId

where MF.MunicipalityId=:municipality and MF.DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by FC.Category
FormsByCategoryForDashBoard.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select count(MF.FormGUID) as counts,FC.Category
--MF.FormTypeId,MF.FormGUID,FT.ID,FT.FormType,FC.ID,FC.Category
from cx2.MasterForms MF 
inner join cx2.FormTypes FT
on  MF.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join  cx2.FormCategoryMapping FCM
on FCM.FormTypeId=FT.ID
inner join cx2.FormCategories FC
on FC.ID=FCM.FormCategoryId

where MF.MunicipalityId=:municipality and MF.DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by FC.Category) wmTempTable

FormsByVendorsForDashboard.name: FormsByVendorsForDashboard
FormsByVendorsForDashboard.queryString:
select V.companyName as vendorCompany ,count(MF.formGuid) as counts 
from MasterForms  MF inner join cx2.Vendor V
on MF.CXVendorId=V.ID where MF.MunicipalityId=:municipality and MF.DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by V.companyName
FormsByVendorsForDashboard.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select V.companyName as vendorCompany ,count(MF.formGuid) as counts 
from MasterForms  MF inner join cx2.Vendor V
on MF.CXVendorId=V.ID where MF.MunicipalityId=:municipality and MF.DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by V.companyName) wmTempTable

FormsCountForMunicipalities.name: FormsCountForMunicipalities
FormsCountForMunicipalities.queryString: select count(*) as formsCount from MasterForms where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId
FormsCountForMunicipalities.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as formsCount from MasterForms where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId) wmTempTable

FormsForUsersAndShared.name: FormsForUsersAndShared
FormsForUsersAndShared.description: Brings closed or opened  Forms of creator and shared with user
FormsForUsersAndShared.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where  FT.CodeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement and 
    Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or MF.FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from SharedWith WHERE SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
    AND (:municipalityId IS NULL OR FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId)
ORDER BY DateModified DESC

FormsTaggedWithGISRecords.name: FormsTaggedWithGISRecords
FormsTaggedWithGISRecords.queryString: from MasterForms where FormGUID IN (select relatedFormGuid from Gis2forms where gisrecordId=:gisrecordId ) ORDER BY DateModified DESC
FormsTaggedWithGISRecords.countQueryString: select count(*) from MasterForms where FormGUID IN (select relatedFormGuid from Gis2forms where gisrecordId=:gisrecordId )

FormsTypesForDashboard.name: FormsTypesForDashboard
FormsTypesForDashboard.queryString:
select formTypes.formType as formType ,count(formGuid) as counts from MasterForms where municipalityId=:municipality and DateSubmitted BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate
group by formTypes.formType

GetFeeIdsOfUserInCart.name: GetFeeIdsOfUserInCart
GetFeeIdsOfUserInCart.queryString: select FeeId as id from MyCart where UserId=:user
GetFeeIdsOfUserInCart.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select FeeId as id from MyCart where UserId=:user) wmTempTable

GetFormTypesByCategoriesAndMunicipalitie.name: GetFormTypesByCategoriesAndMunicipalities
GetFormTypesByCategoriesAndMunicipalitie.queryString:
select FT.* from FormTypes FT, FormCategoryMapping FM 
WHERE ((:formCategory IS NULL AND FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) OR (:formCategory IS NOT NULL AND FM.FormCategoryId=:formCategory))
and FM.FormTypeId=FT.ID
and FT.Active=1
and (FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=0
		OR EXISTS (SELECT RoleName from Roles where
					UserId=:userId
					and (MunicipalityId=FT.MunicipalityId and (RoleName='MunicipalityEmployee' or RoleName='MunicipalityAdmin')) or RoleName='CXAdmin'))
GetFormTypesByCategoriesAndMunicipalitie.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select FT.* from FormTypes FT, FormCategoryMapping FM 
WHERE ((:formCategory IS NULL AND FT.MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) OR (:formCategory IS NOT NULL AND FM.FormCategoryId=:formCategory))
and FM.FormTypeId=FT.ID
and FT.Active=1
and (FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=0
		OR EXISTS (SELECT RoleName from Roles where
					UserId=:userId
					and (MunicipalityId=FT.MunicipalityId and (RoleName='MunicipalityEmployee' or RoleName='MunicipalityAdmin')) or RoleName='CXAdmin'))) wmTempTable

GetFormsForMunicpality.name: GetFormsForMunicpality
GetFormsForMunicpality.queryString: select DISTINCT * from FormTypes where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId
GetFormsForMunicpality.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select DISTINCT * from FormTypes where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId) wmTempTable

GetGis2formsByForm.name: GetGis2formsByForm

GetMunicipalityEmployees.name: GetMunicipalityEmployees
GetMunicipalityEmployees.queryString:
from Users
where id IN (select userId from Roles where roleName=:RoleName and municipalityId=:municipalityId) and email like :email
GetMunicipalityEmployees.countQueryString:
select count(*) from Users
where id IN (select userId from Roles where roleName=:RoleName and municipalityId=:municipalityId) and email like :email

GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID.name: GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID
GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID.queryString:
select CASE count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsProcessOwner from MasterForms MF, FormStatuses FS, MunicipalityGroups MG
    WHERE MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID
    and FS.ID=MF.formStatusId
	and MG.ID=FS.processOwners
	and :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)
GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select CASE count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsProcessOwner from MasterForms MF, FormStatuses FS, MunicipalityGroups MG
    WHERE MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID
    and FS.ID=MF.formStatusId
	and MG.ID=FS.processOwners
	and :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)) wmTempTable

GetProjectGisrecords.countQueryString: select count(*) from ProjectGisrecords where relatedProjectGuid=:relatedProjectGuid

GetRolesForMunicipality.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select U.* from Users U,Roles R where  R.RoleName=:role and R.MunicipalityId=:municipality and R.UserId=U.ID) wmTempTable

GetVendorApprovalListByMunicipality.queryString: from VendorApprovals where ApprovalStatus=:ApprovalStatus and MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId and vendor.active=:a
GetVendorApprovalListByMunicipality.countQueryString: select count(*) from VendorApprovals where ApprovalStatus=:ApprovalStatus and MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId and vendor.active=:a

GetWriteAccessGroupMembersByFormGUID.name: GetWriteAccessGroupMembersByFormGUID
GetWriteAccessGroupMembersByFormGUID.queryString: select MGM.*,MG.GroupName from MunicipalityGroupMembers MGM,MunicipalityGroups MG, MasterForms MF,FormStatuses FS where  MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID and MF.FormStatusId=FS.ID and FS.WriteAccess=MG.ID and MG.ID=MGM.MunicipalityGroupId
GetWriteAccessGroupMembersByFormGUID.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select MGM.*,MG.GroupName from MunicipalityGroupMembers MGM,MunicipalityGroups MG, MasterForms MF,FormStatuses FS where  MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID and MF.FormStatusId=FS.ID and FS.WriteAccess=MG.ID and MG.ID=MGM.MunicipalityGroupId) wmTempTable

InspectionDesignForCategoriesMappedToFor.name: InspectionDesignForCategoriesMappedToForms

ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality.name: ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality
ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality.description: Get forms from Master Forms where employee is in group of that in current form Status
ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality.queryString:
SELECT MF.FormGuid as formGuid,
	MF.FormTitle as formTitle,
	MU.MunicipalityName as municipalityName,
	U.FullName as createdBy,
	FT.FormType as formDesign,
	FS.Status as formStatus,
	GR.Lot as lot,
	GR.Subdivision as subdivision,
	GR.FullAddress as address,
	V.CompanyName as primaryVendor,
	MF.BalanceDue as balanceDue
FROM MasterForms MF
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormStatuses AS FS ON FS.ID=MF.FormStatusId
LEFT OUTER JOIN FormTypes AS FT ON FT.ID=MF.FormTypeId
LEFT OUTER JOIN Municipalities AS MU ON MU.ID=FT.MunicipalityId
LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID=MF.UserId
LEFT JOIN MunicipalityGroups AS MG ON MG.id=FS.processOwners
LEFT OUTER JOIN Vendor AS V ON V.ID=MF.CXVendorId
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY GF.RelatedFormGUID ORDER BY GF.AddedTime) AS rn,
				GF.RelatedFormGuid as formGuid,
				GR.Lot,
				SD.Subdivision,
				GR.FullAddress
				FROM GIS2Forms GF, GisRecords GR, Subdivisions SD
				WHERE GR.ID=GF.GISRecordId AND SD.ID=GR.SubdivisionId
) AS GR ON GR.FormGuid=MF.FormGUID AND GR.rn=1
where
    Closed=:closed
    AND FT.MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId
	AND :UserId IN (SELECT GM.userId FROM MunicipalityGroupMembers GM WHERE GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id)
ORDER BY DateModified DESC

ProjectForms.countQueryString: select count(*) from ProjectForms where RelatedProjectGUID=:project

assignedInspectionsBetweenDates.name: assignedInspectionsBetweenDates
assignedInspectionsBetweenDates.queryString:
select 
inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
assignedTo as assignedTo,
usersByAssignedTo.fullName as assignedToPersonName,
inspectionOutcome.outcome as outcome,
inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
requestedFor as requestedFor,
gisrecords.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gisrecords.lot as lot,
gisrecords.subdivisions.subdivision as subdivision,
usersByRequestedBy.fullName as fullName,
inspectionDesign.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName

from MasterInspections where inspectionDesign.municipalities.id=:municipality and closed=:isClosed and assignedTo=:assignedTo and requestedFor between :startDate and :endDate

assignedInspectionsLessThanDate.name: assignedInspectionsLessThanDate
assignedInspectionsLessThanDate.queryString:
select 
inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
assignedTo as assignedTo,
usersByAssignedTo.fullName as assignedToPersonName,
inspectionOutcome.outcome as outcome,
inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
requestedFor as requestedFor,
gisrecords.fullAddress as fullAddress,
gisrecords.lot as lot,
gisrecords.subdivisions.subdivision as subdivision,
usersByRequestedBy.fullName as fullName,
inspectionDesign.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName

from MasterInspections where inspectionDesign.municipalities.id=:municipality and closed=:isClosed and assignedTo=:assignedTo and requestedFor<:requestedFor

distinctInspectionDesignsForFormType.queryString:
select DISTINCT inspectDesignId as inspectionDesignId,inspectionDesign.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName,inspectionDesign.allowSameDayInspections as allowSameDayInspections,inspectionDesign. maxDaysInAdvance as maxDaysInAdvance,sequenceOrderNumber as sequenceOrderNumber,mustCompBeforeReqNxt as mustCompBeforeReqNxt from InspectionSequence

      users.fullName as fullName,

       formTypes.codeEnforcement as codeEnforcement

where formTypes.codeEnforcement=:codeEnforcement and closed=:closed and municipalityId=:municipalityId

select formGuid as formGuid,
       formTitle as formTitle,
      users.fullName as fullName,

      formTypes.formType as formType,

getFormTypeFieldsByTypeId.countQueryString: select count(*) FROM FormTypeFields WHERE FormTypeId=:formTypeId

getInspectionDesignByInspectionCategorie.name: getInspectionDesignByInspectionCategoriesAssignedToFormType
getInspectionDesignByInspectionCategorie.queryString:
select I.ID , I.InspectDesignName,I.MaxDaysInAdvance,I.AllowSameDayInspections
from 
InspectionDesign I,
InspectionCategoryMapping ICM,
InspectionCategories IC,
FormToInspectionCategoryMapping FICM
where
FICM.FormTypeId=:formType and FICM.InspectionCategoryId=IC.ID
and IC.ID=ICM.InspectionCategoryId and ICM.InspectionDesignId=I.ID
getInspectionDesignByInspectionCategorie.countQueryString:
select count(*) from (select I.ID , I.InspectDesignName,I.MaxDaysInAdvance,I.AllowSameDayInspections
from 
InspectionDesign I,
InspectionCategoryMapping ICM,
InspectionCategories IC,
FormToInspectionCategoryMapping FICM
where
FICM.FormTypeId=:formType and FICM.InspectionCategoryId=IC.ID
and IC.ID=ICM.InspectionCategoryId and ICM.InspectionDesignId=I.ID) wmTempTable

getInspectionsByOutcome.name: getInspectionsByOutcome
getInspectionsByOutcome.queryString:
select 
inspectionGuid as inspectionGuid,
assignedTo as assignedTo,
inspectionOutcome.outcome as outcome,
inspectionTitle as inspectionTitle,
inspectionZone as inspectionZone,
requestedFor as requestedFor,
inspectionDesign.inspectDesignName as inspectDesignName

from MasterInspections where inspectionDesign.municipalities.id=:municipality and inspectionOutcome.outcome=:outcome and assignedTo is null
Order By inspectionZone DESC

getInspectionsToBeScheduledByMunicipalit.queryString:
select 
count(*)
as inspectionsToBeScheduled
from MasterInspections where inspectionDesign.municipalities.id=:municipality and inspectionOutcome.outcome=:outcome and assignedTo is null

getListofGroupName.name: getListofGroupName
getListofGroupName.description: get all the list of group Names based on mun ID
getListofGroupName.queryString: select ID,GroupName from MunicipalityGroups where ID IN :MunicipalityGroupID AND MunicipalityId =:MunicipalityID
getListofGroupName.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select ID,GroupName from MunicipalityGroups where ID IN :MunicipalityGroupID AND MunicipalityId =:MunicipalityID) wmTempTable

getListofUsers.name: getListofUsers
getListofUsers.description: to get List of user based on municipality ID and role Name
getListofUsers.queryString: select a.UserId , b.Email, b.FullName from Roles a INNER JOIN Users b on a.UserId = b.ID where a.RoleName IN ('MunicipalityEmployee','MunicipalityAdmin') and a.MunicipalityId =:municipalityID and (b.Email LIKE LOWER(concat('%',:Email,'%')) OR LOWER(b.FullName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',:Email,'%')))
getListofUsers.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select a.UserId , b.Email, b.FullName from Roles a INNER JOIN Users b on a.UserId = b.ID where a.RoleName IN ('MunicipalityEmployee','MunicipalityAdmin') and a.MunicipalityId =:municipalityID and (b.Email LIKE LOWER(concat('%',:Email,'%')) OR LOWER(b.FullName) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%',:Email,'%')))) wmTempTable

getMunicipalityGroupIdIDs.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select MunicipalityGroupId from MunicipalityGroupMembers where UserId =:userID) wmTempTable

getOwnersForGisRecords.countQueryString: select count(*) FROM Giscontacts WHERE contactType='Owner' AND active=1 AND gisRecordId IN :gisRecordIds

getRolesForUser.countQueryString: select count(*) from (SELECT RoleName, MunicipalityId FROM Roles WHERE UserId=:userId) wmTempTable

getUserID.queryString: select ID from Users where Email =:Email
getUserID.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select ID from Users where Email =:Email) wmTempTable

getUserIdFromPasswordResetToken.name: getUserIdFromPasswordResetToken
getUserIdFromPasswordResetToken.description: Returns a UserID, given a valid password reset token. Used internally
getUserIdFromPasswordResetToken.queryString: select UserId from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)
getUserIdFromPasswordResetToken.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select UserId from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)) wmTempTable

resetPasswordForUser.name: resetPasswordForUser
resetPasswordForUser.description: Resets password for a user, given user ID as Integer and password as String.
resetPasswordForUser.queryString: UPDATE Users SET Password=:newPassword where ID in (select UserId from UserPasswordResetTokens where ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() and Token = :token)

resetPasswordWithTokenForUser.name: resetPasswordWithTokenForUser
resetPasswordWithTokenForUser.description: This saves a reset password token in the DB given a User ID and Token.
resetPasswordWithTokenForUser.queryString:
DELETE FROM UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE UserId = :userid 
INSERT INTO UserPasswordResetTokens (UserId, Token, ExpirationDate) VALUES ( :userid, :token, DATEADD(day, 2, GETDATE()))

searchUsersByEmailOrName.name: searchUsersByEmailOrName
searchUsersByEmailOrName.description: Searches users by email or full name
searchUsersByEmailOrName.queryString: SELECT ID, FullName, Photo, Email FROM Users WHERE Active=1 AND (Email LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%') OR FullName LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%'))
searchUsersByEmailOrName.countQueryString: select count(*) from (SELECT ID, FullName, Photo, Email FROM Users WHERE Active=1 AND (Email LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%') OR FullName LIKE CONCAT('%',:searchString,'%'))) wmTempTable

sumOfFeesInUsersCart.name: sumOfFeesInUsersCart
sumOfFeesInUsersCart.queryString: select sum(fees.amount) as sumOfFeesInCart from MyCart where userId=:user and fees.paidStatus='Unpaid'
sumOfFeesInUsersCart.countQueryString: select count(*)  from MyCart where userId=:user and fees.paidStatus='Unpaid'

updateAssessFeeYN.queryString: update InspectionOutcome set AssessFeeYN=:AssessFeeYN where ID=:id

userSubscriptionsCount.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCount from UserSubscriptions) wmTempTable

userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality.queryString: select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality from UserSubscriptions where MunicipalityId=:municipalityId
userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality from UserSubscriptions where MunicipalityId=:municipalityId) wmTempTable

verifyPasswordResetToken.name: verifyPasswordResetToken
verifyPasswordResetToken.description: Given a token, Validates token based on expiration date. Null returned if no tokens match or expiration date is past.
verifyPasswordResetToken.queryString: select * from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)
verifyPasswordResetToken.countQueryString: select count(*) from (select * from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)) wmTempTable
